gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 103, Pistons 102
gameRecap.excerpt: Cade Cunningham missed a deep 3PT FG attempt from the top of the arc in the closing seconds as the Heat defeated the Pistons, 103-102. Bam Adebayo led the Heat with 22 points and eight rebounds as Jimmy Butler (19 points, 13 rebounds) and Tyler Herro (16 points) totaled 35 points. Cade Cunningham led the Pistons with 30 points and 9 assists while Jalen Duren totaled 17 points and 14 rebounds. Ausar Thompson tallied four points, seven rebounds, three assists, and five blocks in his career debut.
